content: i was inspired to design this hat so it would be warm and cosy and fit either a man or a woman it is made with k2 p2 rib making it stretchy enough to fit most adults it is long enough to allow a good size turn up to keep ears cosy it takes less than 100g of chunky weight yarn it can also be made using two strands of double knit yarn held together **why not make one to donate for someone who is homeless ** 1
